name: ExtractFiles
description: Extract files from a variety of archive types, e.g. .zip, .tar, .7z
author: Batman
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: rootDir
inputs.label: Root Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root directory under which the TAR file name or pattern will be matched.

inputs.name: tarFilePattern
inputs.label: TAR File Name or Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name or pattern of the TAR files to extract. Supports a minimatch pattern. [More Information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)

inputs.name: targetDir
inputs.label: Target Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory in which TAR contents should be extracted.

inputs.name: cleanTargetDir
inputs.label: Clean Target Directory Before Extracting
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to clean the target directory before TAR contents are extracted into it.
